title: 'I don't care about Nobel Prize': Trump breaks silence on letter to Norway PM
content: President Trump declared he no longer cares about the Nobel Prize after not receiving it, despite previously campaigning for it. He also stated he no longer feels obligated to "think purely of Peace" regarding Greenland, questioning Denmark's ownership and demanding NATO support for U.S. control of the territory.

title: Stock market crash: Nifty50 ends below 25,250; BSE Sensex down over 1,000 points - top reasons
content: Stock market crash today: Indian stock markets, Nifty50 and Sensex, experienced a significant crash today, driven by a sharp selloff in technology stocks amidst uneven earnings and global trade uncertainties. Foreign investors continued their selling spree, while gold and silver prices surged, signaling a clear shift towards risk aversion among investors seeking safe havens.

title: Crowd chants 'Gambhir haye haye'; Virat Kohli reacts— watch
content: A viral video claiming Indore crowds chanted slogans against head coach Gautam Gambhir after the third ODI against New Zealand is misleading. Fact-checkers found the audio was likely from an older incident, not genuine chants from the stadium. The focus now shifts to the T20I series against New Zealand.

title: ‘Expose them to public’: PM Modi targets parties ‘protecting’ illegal immigrants
content: Without naming any political party, but in an apparent attack on Trinamool Congress (TMC), which rules the poll-bound West Bengal, PM Modi lashed out at parties "covering up for illegal immigrants" and said: "We must expose them to the public". ​PM Modi also said the world doesn't question the "wealthiest and most powerful countries" when they crack down on illegal immigrants.

title: Oracle HQ plan faces pushback: Staff resists Nashville office move: cite lower pay bands
content: Oracle faces employee reluctance to relocate to its new Nashville 'world HQ' due to concerns over lower salary ceilings compared to California. Despite incentives and a futuristic campus plan, tech workers fear a pay band demotion. The company is investing heavily in Nashville, but employee numbers there remain low compared to other locations.

title: Kerala: Row over governor’s address in assembly — what happened
content: Kerala governor Rajendra Vishwanath Arlekar omitted and added to the state cabinet-approved policy address, drawing sharp criticism from chief minister Pinarayi Vijayan. The chief minister urged the speaker to consider only the cabinet-approved version as the official record. A similar incident occurred in Tamil Nadu where the governor walked out after refusing to read the prepared address.

title: T20 World Cup row: 'We will not accept' - Bangladesh rejects ICC's 'unreasonable' conditions
content: Bangladesh has rejected "unreasonable conditions" from the ICC for the T20 World Cup 2026 in India, citing venue concerns and the exclusion of Mustafizur Rahman from the IPL. Despite talks, Bangladesh's participation remains uncertain as the ICC insists on the original schedule, assuring security.

title: Sulaiman Khan Ghori exit: Engineer leaves xAI after podcast; sparks firing speculation
content: Former xAI engineer Sulaiman Khan Ghori has departed the company, sparking speculation he was "fired" for being "too candid" during a podcast interview. Ghori discussed xAI's rapid development, novel architectures like "Macro Hard," and innovative deployment strategies, including using Tesla computers for "human emulators."

title: Shivakumar's brother namedrops Rahul in CM row; Siddaramaiah puts it to 'high command’
content: Speculation over the Karnataka chief minister post continues. DK Shivakumar's brother said that Rahul Gandhi assured a decision would be made  at an "appropriate time". Shivakumar is reportedly exercising restraint for party unity. The upcoming legislative session may offer clarity. Meanwhile, Chief Minister Siddaramaiah remains open to discussions in New Delhi.

title: NEET PG cut off controversy explained: Here is what has happened so far
content: NEET PG 2025 qualifying cut-offs were drastically lowered, allowing candidates with zero or negative scores to be eligible for counselling. This move, aimed at filling vacant postgraduate seats, has sparked widespread criticism from medical bodies concerned about academic standards and patient safety. The controversy has escalated to the Supreme Court, highlighting broader issues of merit and governance in medical education.

title: Noida techie’s death: Builder arrested for criminal negligence
content: Greater Noida police arrested Abhay Kumar, builder of MZ Wiztown, in connection with the death of software engineer Yuvraj Mehta. Mehta's SUV plunged into an unbarricaded, water-filled pit on January 16-17. The arrest follows findings of negligence in construction site safety measures.

title: 'Devil': Elon Musk on ChatGPT; says 'OpenAI chatbot convinced man to murder and ...'
content: Elon Musk has labeled OpenAI's ChatGPT as 'diabolical' following a lawsuit alleging the chatbot influenced a man to commit murder-suicide. The suit claims the AI reinforced paranoid beliefs, leading to the deaths of an elderly woman and her son. Musk, a co-founder of OpenAI, is also suing the company for deviating from its non-profit mission.

title: 8th Pay Commission: How much will your salary, pension increase?
content: Central government employees and pensioners await the 8th Pay Commission's recommendations on revised salaries and pensions. The commission, led by Ranjana Prakash Desai, will finalize a fitment factor, a multiplier crucial for determining salary hikes. Projections show significant increases based on potential fitment factors ranging from 2.15 to 2.86.

title: 'Want to play like him': Hardik Pandya's special message leaves RCB player emotional
content: Hardik Pandya sent a special video message to RCB's Gautami Naik after her match-winning fifty in the WPL. Naik, who considers Pandya her idol, was overjoyed by the gesture. Pandya congratulated her on her maiden half-century and urged her to stay disciplined and enjoy the game. RCB continued their winning streak, remaining unbeaten.

title: Maggi packets, 20kg rice, cylinders: JeM’s winter bunker unearthed; terrorists stocked up for months
content: A Pakistan-based Jaish-e-Mohammad terror hideout, stocked for months, was busted by the army in Kishtwar's high mountains. The intense operation resulted in the supreme sacrifice of one commando and injuries to several others. Security forces continue to comb the area following the discovery.

title: 'A deal is a deal': EU chief pushes back as Trump threatens 100% tariffs over Greenland
content: EU chief Ursula von der Leyen warned the US against imposing tariffs on European allies over Greenland, calling it a "mistake" that could damage partnerships. She emphasized that existing trade deals must be honored and offered increased European investment and cooperation on Arctic security, urging Europe to adapt to global changes.

title: US-EU ties straining? How Trump's Greenland bid may benefit India
content: India stands to gain from the US-EU trade friction as the EU finalizes its Free Trade Agreement with New Delhi. With US tariffs impacting European exports, the bloc may accelerate ties with India. Experts suggest this could lead to a more favorable deal and faster ratification, potentially boosting Indian exports amid global trade uncertainties.

title: ‘Great stupidity’: After Greenland, Trump eyes Diego Garcia; why it matters to India
content: President Trump's criticism of the UK potentially returning Diego Garcia to Mauritius, a move backed by India, has escalated. This island hosts a vital US military base. India, with its own security interests in the Indian Ocean and historical ties to Mauritius, is supporting the decolonization process, offering significant aid for the archipelago's development.

title: Budget 2026: Why standard deduction should be hiked under the new income tax regime
content: Budget 2026 income tax expectations: Salaried taxpayers are looking at FM Nirmala Sitharaman to provide further relief under the new income tax regime, especially in the form of higher standard deduction limit.

title: No more A+ category? BCCI plans contract overhaul; Kohli, Rohit likely to drop
content: The BCCI is considering a major overhaul of its central contracts, potentially scrapping the Grade A+ category. This move could see senior players like Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma, now focusing on ODIs, placed in Grade B. The proposed three-tier system aims to align contracts with workload and format involvement.

title: Cervical cancer can be silent in stage 1: Docs explain how
content: Cervical cancer is a silent threat, often lacking early symptoms, making awareness and regular screening crucial. Subtle signs like irregular bleeding or unusual discharge are frequently dismissed but warrant medical attention. Early detection, especially in Stage 1, offers highly treatable outcomes with excellent survival rates. Don't ignore subtle bodily changes; consult a doctor promptly.

title: Klay Thompson’s heartfelt gesture for Megan Thee Stallion leaves fans emotional
content: Klay Thompson and Megan Thee Stallion have inspired billions around the world with the love and commitment they have shown towards each other over the past few months. While Megan Thee Stallion has often spoken out about how grateful she is for Klay Thompson, the star player’s recent gesture has sparked chaos among fans.

title: Mic switched off, 'misleading' statement: How TN assembly drama unfolded
content: Tamil Nadu Governor R N Ravi walked out of the Assembly without delivering his customary address, citing "inaccuracies" in the DMK government's prepared text. Chief Minister M K Stalin condemned the act as a violation of rules and an insult to the House. Stalin vowed to seek constitutional amendments to remove the Governor's address mandate.

title: 'Nitin Nabin is my boss': PM congratulates 'millennial' BJP chief; calls himself a 'party worker'
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi declared Nitin Nabin his "boss" as the party worker after Nabin, the BJP's youngest-ever national president at 45, assumed office. PM Modi highlighted Nabin's millennial status, emphasizing his blend of youthful energy and organizational experience as crucial for building a developed India over the next 25 years.

title: ‘Confidence takes a hit’: Ashwin flags major T20 WC test; India stunned by NZ loss
content: Ravichandran Ashwin expressed concern over Kuldeep Yadav's confidence ahead of the T20 World Cup following a challenging ODI series against New Zealand. Ashwin urged Kuldeep to experiment more against in-form batters like Daryl Mitchell, who exploited the spinner's predictability. He also suggested both Indian spinners need to expand their game creatively.

title: Karnataka DGP under fire: 'Sleaze' video, suspension ordered; Ranya Rao gold smuggling case looms
content: Senior IPS officer K Ramachandra Rao faces suspension and inquiry following the surfacing of alleged sleaze videos. The controversy, initially linked to a gold smuggling case involving his stepdaughter, has escalated into a political storm. The Karnataka government has moved swiftly, emphasizing accountability for all, regardless of rank, as the investigation unfolds.

title: 'No going back': Trump posts image showing Canada, Greenland as US territory; what he told Nato chief
content: US President Donald Trump is set to push for acquiring Greenland at the Davos Economic Forum, citing Denmark's inability to protect the territory. He shared an image depicting Greenland as US territory and stated its acquisition is imperative for national and world security. Trump also mentioned a call with NATO Secretary General Mark Rutte regarding the Danish island.

title: 'Dhurandhar' collection: Film begins to slow down in the eighth week
content: Aditya Dhar's 'Dhurandhar' continues its record-breaking box office run, entering its seventh week with a strong performance. The film has achieved an extraordinary milestone in Mysore, nearing Rs 70 crore nett, a feat comparable only to 'Sholay' among Hindi films. Despite a slight dip on its seventh Monday, 'Dhurandhar' has amassed Rs 826.94 crore, demonstrating remarkable consistency.

title: High drama in TN assembly: Governor walks out; alleges 'national anthem insulted'
content: Tamil Nadu Governor RN Ravi staged a walkout from the state assembly, citing disrespect for the National Anthem and his microphone being switched off. Raj Bhavan alleged the speech ignored critical issues like Dalit atrocities. This marks a repeat of a similar incident last year, intensifying political tensions ahead of upcoming elections.

title: ‘Roads kill, bridges kill, fires kill’: Rahul Gandhi reacts to Noida techie death
content: Rahul Gandhi's 'TINA' jibe, meaning 'There Is No Accountability,' targeted the government following a techie's tragic death in a Greater Noida pit. The 27-year-old engineer's family claims repeated warnings about the accident-prone site were ignored.  Authorities have filed an FIR against developers and formed an SIT to investigate the incident and rescue delays.

title: Too risky? Why India should not join Trump’s $1 billion ‘Board of Peace’ — explained
content: India faces a strategic dilemma as the US invites it to join the Gaza Peace Board, a US-led initiative for post-war reconstruction. A GTRI report urges caution, citing concerns over political imbalance, bypassing UN norms, and potential commercial interests overshadowing Palestinian rights. The report highlights risks to India's credibility.

title: New Saudization rules for marketing and sales: Saudi Arabia sets 60% quota
content: Saudi Arabia’s Ministry of Human Resources and Social Development has raised Saudization rates to 60 percent for marketing and sales roles in the private sector, effective January 19. Establishments with three or more employees must comply within 90 days. Targeted positions include managers, specialists, and representatives, with a minimum wage of SAR 5,500. Support programs and guidance are provided to ease implementation.

title: Oskar Sundqvist injury update: Blues forward suffers skate cut vs Oilers
content: Blues forward Oskar Sundqvist suffered a deep skate cut above his ankle after a collision with Connor McDavid. While head coach Jim Montgomery confirmed the injury did not touch his Achilles, the severity of the cut leaves his return timeline uncertain. Sundqvist is listed as day-to-day, impacting the Blues' forward depth.

title: Twice a cancer survivor, invites her doctor to her 50th wedding anniversary celebration
content: A 70-year-old woman, a breast cancer survivor, faced a new battle with pancreatic cancer. Despite her age and existing health conditions, she underwent a complex robotic-assisted Whipple procedure. Her remarkable recovery and the unwavering support of her family allowed her to reclaim life's milestones, including her upcoming 50th wedding anniversary.

title: UK drops international student targets in new strategy
content: The UK’s new international education strategy signals a quiet but significant shift for overseas students. By dropping student-number targets and tightening compliance, the government is moving from growth to control. While Britain remains open, the welcome feels more conditional, introducing uncertainty around visas, access, and long-term opportunities for international learners.

title: Tilak Varma update: Batter to reach BCCI CoE today; getting closer to regaining full fitness
content: Tilak Varma is closing in on full fitness and will report to the BCCI’s Centre of Excellence for assessment. Ruled out of the first three T20Is against New Zealand, the India No. 3 could return for the fourth match. Team India's ODI vice-captain Shreyas Iyer has been added as cover meanwhile.

title: Tamil Nadu Assembly session to conclude on January 24
content: The House would debate on the motion of thanks to the Governor’s address to the House on January 22 and 23. The reply to the debate is scheduled on January 24

title: Trinamool Congress says West Bengal will resist moves that make voting ‘burdensome’
content: SIR is ‘Software Intensive Rigging’, alleges Trinamool Congress, as the party seeks more transparency in the process

title: Open-air workshop to take up acclaimed poems on Kolkata for translation
content: Called Maidane Anubade Mahanagar (The City in Translation at the Maidan), this workshop-cum–translators’ meet will be held on January 25

title: KMC focuses on collecting property tax arrears
content: According to KMC officials, there are 1,24,049 property tax assessees in the city, with a total demand of ₹128.11 crore, including arrears of ₹45.33 crore and demand for current year of ₹82.77 crore

title: DMK to bat for Constitutional amendment to do away with Governor’s customary address: Tamil Nadu CM Stalin
content: Governor’s action has proved The Hindu’s editorial to be right, wrote Chief Minister in a social media post

title: Noida techie death: Developer accused of negligence arrested
content: The police have filed an FIR against two real estate developers — MZ Wiztown Planners and Lotus Greens — on a complaint by the victim's father

title: Clashes erupt, RAF deployed, Internet services suspended in Assam’s Kokrajhar
content: On January 20, the National Highway adjacent to Karigaon outpost was blocked by burning tyres and a few houses; a government office was set ablaze and the Karigaon police outpost was attacked, an official said

title: SC to examine Karnataka HC’s decision to quash KCOCA against BJP MLA in murder case
content: KCOCA can be invoked provided the offence has a minimum punishment of three years, a condition that the HC had cited while giving relief to the BJP leader; to this the SC asked, “what would happen to Section 307 of the IPC” which does not specify a minimum punishment against murder

title: Kerala Governor announces Pattissery dam in Idukki to be commissioned by February 15
content: Pattissery dam project involves water entitled to Kerala under Cauvery Inter-State River Water Dispute. The Banasura Sagar main canal is expected to be ready by May and Karappuzha project, by December

title: Telangana Govt yet to finalise dates for crediting Rythu Bandhu amounts into farmers’ accounts
content: Non completion of survey of agricultural lands is said to be the reason behind the delay in crediting the farmers investment support

title: BJP councillor R. Sreelekha calls for relocating dry waste collection facility in front of her office in Kerala capital
content: The facility, with bins for segregated collection of waste, has been popular with residents ever since it was opened eight years ago. Sreelekha says demand raised to ease pedestrian issues

title: APSRTC records all-time high revenue of ₹27.68 crore on January 19, 2026
content: As many as 5.06 million passengers travelled by APSRTC buses across the State in the post Sankranti travel

title: Carving of mythological Gandabherunda found at Vinukonda Narasimhaswamy temple
content: This temple must have been one of the famous Vaishnava temples at that time. Because, only great temples generally have this kind of Gandabherunda carvings, ASI Director said

title: Satheesan slams Kerala Governor’s policy address as filled with ‘half-truths and fake claims’ of LDF govt
content: Opposition Leader says LDF government’s ‘failures can be read in between the lines’ of the policy document

title: Suit filed to declare Ramadoss as PMK president: advocate
content: A suit has also been filed in the City Civil Court seeking to restrain Mr. Anbumani from using the PMK flag, symbol or the party name

title: Mohammed Shami appears for SIR hearing in Kolkata
content: Shami appeared before the poll officials with the necessary documents at a school in south Kolkata's Bikramgarh area, he said

title: A.P. Space Tech Summit–2026 to be conducted at Vignan’s University from January 22
content: The summit, themed “Leveraging Space Technology for Viksit Bharat–2047”, aims to promote research, innovation, start-ups, and industry–academia collaboration in the space sector

title: Kerala economy has entered phase of ‘accelerated and broad-based’ growth: Governor’s policy address
content: The two-hour address, which sparked a row over ‘omissions,’ and ‘additions’ by the Governor, dwelt on the achievements of the LDF government, while being sharply critical of the fiscal policies of the BJP-led Centre

title: Tamil Nadu Congress receives over 5,200 applications from ticket aspirants for Assembly elections
content: Mr. Deo did not want to comment on speculation whether Congress would form an alliance with the Tamilaga Vettri Kazhagam (TVK)

title: Congress delegation urges Karnataka CM to allocate ₹1,000 crore in first phase for Greater Mysuru City Corporation
content: Congress leaders listed a number of basic infrastructure requirements once the existing MCC area of 86 sq km is expanded to 341.44 sq km under the GMCC

title: Akhilesh links rising gold, silver prices to BJP's ‘new economic concept of corruption’
content: Akhilesh Yadav alleged the surge in the prices of precious metals had serious social consequences, leading to a rise in incidents of theft, burglary, robbery, and snatching in homes, neighbourhoods, shops and markets, and requiring additional security forces

title: 106 kg of cannabis worth ₹53 lakh seized in Puttur in coastal Karnataka, two arrested
content: The accused told the police that they were transporting the cannabis to sell in Dakshina Kannada district in Karnataka and Kasargod district in Kerala

title: Have taken bullets for India, ready to face them again: Farooq Abdullah
content: The former Chief Minister rejected calls for a fresh bifurcation of Jammu and Kashmir, labelling such demands as "foolish and ignorant"

title: Hydrogen gas cylinder explosion in Kallakurichi: Balloon seller booked for negligence, CM announces solatium
content: Tamil Nadu Chief Minister M.K. Stalin announced a compensation of ₹3 lakh to kin of Kala who was killed in the explosion

title: Nitin Nabin my boss in party matters, says PM Modi
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi describes the 45-year-old Mr. Nabin as a “millennial” who belongs to a generation that has witnessed a great deal of change in India

title: T.N. Assembly: Total breakdown of law and order under DMK’s rule, alleges Palaniswami
content: On Governor’s walkout, the AIADMK leader said, “During the Governor’s address, only his speech should go on record. However, the Chief Minister also made his own remarks in it. This is a violation of established convention.”

title: Noida techie death: India’s urban collapse due to lack of accountability, says Rahul Gandhi
content: “Bridges kill, Fires kill, Water kills, Pollution kills, Corruption kills, Indifference kills. India’s urban collapse isn’t about lack of money, technology, or solutions. It’s about lack of accountability. TINA: There Is No Accountability,” Mr. Gandhi said in a post on X

title: Gehlot flags reports of Rajasthan school team held at gunpoint in Manipur
content: Gehlot said videos purportedly showing the distress of the children and their family members had surfaced on social media

title: Kerala Assembly witnesses unusual scene as CM ‘corrects’ Governor’s policy address
content: After seeing off Governor, Pinarayi Vijayan returns to Assembly and announces that Arlekar made changes to some paragraphs in policy speech. CM says that while certain sections were omitted, Governor made additions elsewhere

title: Rare Buddhist relic brought out of museum for public display in Odisha’s Lalitgiri
content: Generally preserved under stringent conservation protocols, the relic was made accessible for public viewing as part of the religious observance, offering devotees a rare and deeply reverential opportunity to pay homage, Odisha government said

title: Madurai LIC office fire: Death of woman officer turns out to be colleague’s murder plot
content: The police said the accused had conspired to eliminate the senior branch manager after she reprimanded him for not clearing over 40 death claims for long.

title: Printing presses of Punjab Kesari newspaper shall continue to function: Supreme Court
content: Supreme Court intervention ensures the continuity of operations for the Punjab Kesari newspaper amidst allegations of pollution violations

title: Army raises objection with Bengal Governor over Mamata’s remarks on Fort William officer
content: According to a senior official at the Lok Bhavan, two Army generals from Fort William, the command headquarters, met Governor Bose last week and submitted a communication, which reportedly objected to Bengal CM Mamata Banerjee’s claims

title: Who is Karnataka DGP K. Ramachandra Rao? Top cop suspended over obscene video
content: A video, where three separate clips have been stitched together, has been widely shared on social media.

title: From party worker to its president: Nitin Nabin becomes BJP's youngest chief — 10 things to know
content: Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) leader Nitin Nabin on Tuesday assumed charge as the party's new national president, marking a key transition in the ruling party's organisational leadership. The swearing-in ceremony was attended by Prime Minister Narendra Modi along with several senior party leaders. BJP chief ministers, national office-bearers, state unit presidents and members of the party’s national executive were also present at the event held in the national capital.

title: Trump’s Greenland push: US President would 100% tariff EU nations
content: President Trump threatened to impose tariffs on European nations if a deal for Greenland isn't reached, stating he would "100%" proceed. He also linked his stance to the Nobel Peace Prize decision, claiming Denmark cannot protect Greenland. Greenland's Prime Minister asserted the territory's right to self-determination.

title: 'I was shaking': Man pulled from Minnesota home in underwear by ICE
content: A US citizen was forcibly removed from his Minnesota home in his underwear by federal immigration agents who allegedly broke down his door without a warrant. The agents detained him at gunpoint, photographed him in frigid weather, and later released him after realizing he was a US citizen with no criminal record. He plans to file a civil rights lawsuit.

title: Nitin Nabin formally appointed BJP’s president at party HQ
content: PM Modi, ex-BJP president J.P. Nadda and Ministers Rajnath Singh, Amit Shah and Nitin Gadkari greeted Mr. Nabin on his election at the event

title: ‘Is ED a person,’ Tamil Nadu and Kerala ask Supreme Court
content: The question cropped up in the Kerala High Court when the ED filed a writ petition under Article 226 of the Constitution seeking the enforcement of its rights

title: Greater Noida Authority orders road safety overhaul after techie's death
content: Greater Noida Industrial Development Authority Chief Executive Officer N.G. Ravi Kumar directed officials to identify and promptly fill all potholes on or near roads and to mark accident-prone “black spots” without delay, according to an official statement issued on January 19, 2026

title: Karnataka government’s approach towards cattle protection is genuine, not tokenism, says Minister Priyank Kharge
content: In a post on social media platform, Mr. Kharge said protecting livestock, which are the backbone of an agrarian economy, was equivalent to protecting farmers

title: WEF 2026: Maharashtra signs investment MoUs worth ₹14.5 lakh crore on first day at Davos
content: The State said these MoUs are across sectors and underscore strong global confidence in Maharashtra’s consumer markets, infrastructure readiness, and long-term growth fundamentals.

title: Tamil Nadu Governor R.N. Ravi walks out of Assembly without reading customary address
content: The Assembly adopts resolution treating his address as ‘read’. Later, Lok Bhavan claimed the address contains ‘misleading statements’. This was the fourth consecutive year Mr. Ravi walked out of the Tamil Nadu Assembly.

title: Devotees can book tickets online to have darshan of Lord Sri Suryanarayana Swamy on the day of Ratha Saptami
content: As the pilgrims’ number is going up by every passing year, the government provided online booking facility for darshan of the presiding deity on the auspicious Surya Jayanti

title: Andhra Pradesh Chandrababu Naidu to court global investors at Davos
content: The Chief Minister will begin the day by addressing the CII Breakfast Session on the theme “The Andhra Pradesh Advantage”

title: Security forces recover IED in Baramulla, J&K
content: The IED was planted by suspected terrorists by the roadside at Takiya Tapper in the Pattani area of Baramulla district, officials said

title: One killed, 12 injured after private bus collides with container truck in Chikkaballapur in Karnataka
content: According to the police, the accident occurred when the bus, which was carrying 28 passengers, collided with a container truck while the driver was attempting to overtake another vehicle

title: Watch: Regional Saffron: On BJP’s rise in Maharashtra politics
content: The Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) has emerged as the dominant force in Maharashtra’s civic body elections, underlining the growing influence of Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis.

title: AI videos of Lord Jagannath surface, police complaint filed
content: One of the videos shows milk being poured over Lord Jagannath in front of the Puri temple using a crane

title: Sabarimala gold theft case: ED raids several premises in Kerala, Karnataka and Tamil Nadu
content: ED raid comes in the wake of the Enquiry Commissioner and Special Judge, Kollam, authorising the agency in early December to open an investigation against the suspects under various provisions of PMLA

title: Karnataka DGP Ramachandra Rao suspended after obscene video goes viral
content: An order issued late on Monday (January 19, 2026), stated that Mr. Rao acted in an obscene manner which is unbecoming of a government servant and also causing embarrassment to the government

title: Gujarat turns to AI, CCTV to identify stray cattle in Ahmedabad
content: The technology will use a cow’s nose as a unique biometric identifier, similar to a human fingerprint

title: Kolkata-based solar power solutions company bags ₹64.95 crore Maharashtra State electricity project
content: As part of this program Jupiter will also launch a farmer awareness initiative through WhatsApp, SMS campaigns, and regional engagement networks to educate beneficiaries about the scheme’s benefits

title: Priyank Kharge plays good samaritan
content: Priyank Kharge on Sunday played the role of good samaritan by helping an accident victim, who was lying on the road, to reach the hospital and get immediate treatment

title: Karnataka CM vows disciplinary action against DGP, after controversial video emerges
content: Former Minister and BJP leader S. Suresh Kumar said that Mr. Rao has brought disrespect to the police, which raises suspicion on the department itself.

title: Cracks appear in Punjab Congress over calls for Dalit representation in party by Channi
content: Channi asserted he did not speak against any particular caste or community, and that he was a victim of malicious propaganda on social media

title: BJD demands Odisha Mines Minister’s removal after ED raids on his representative
content: State Steel and Mines Minister Bibhuti Bhushan Jena had designated Sunil Patra as his representative for mines department and representative’s active involvement in illegal mining came to the fore during ED’s raid, alleged the regional party

title: Odisha’s saltwater crocodile population rises to 1,858
content: As a future strategy, drones and cameras will be used in selected river segments to identify and profile individual crocodiles based on distinctive morphological features, said P. K. Jha, PCCF (Wildlife)

title: SC seeks govt response on plea for quota, concessional fare for acid attack survivors on trains
content: Due to the nature of their burn injuries, persistent itching, especially after undergoing surgery, acid attack survivors often need to travel by train in air-conditioned coaches.

title: Delhi HC quashes 2016 income tax notices to Prannoy Roy, Radhika Roy
content: Bench terms the reassessment proceedings "arbitrary" and against fundamental and constitutional rights

title: No new Guillain Barre Syndrome case in two days in M.P.’s Neemuch; six still in hospital
content: The outbreak had been reported in Neemuch’s Manasa town when child and a teenager died on January 11 and January 13 respectively. 18 people have so far reported to have been infected.

title: Electronics City Industrial Township Authority is a ‘public authority’, rules Karnataka’s Information Commission
content: It had been set up under the Karnataka Municipalities Act, and was acting like a town municipality by being responsible for management, finances and development issues

title: First guava processing plant in Rajasthan to improve farmers’ livelihood with value addition
content: The promotion of agricultural and horticultural products would help enhance the farmers’ income and strengthen the rural economy, said Om Birla

title: Haryana govt.’s changes to monthly aid scheme leave women ‘falling through the cracks’
content: The Haryana government has amended the scheme through a notification on January 8 to make the payment in two parts from the second month onwards

title: Nitish begins Samriddhi Yatra to review 430 projects announced before election
content: During his yatra, Nitish Kumar said that he will increase the financial assistance given to women, especially to Jeevika didis

title: The youth, women, poor, farmers are the foundational pillars of India: V.K. Saraswat, NITI Ayog member
content: ‘The choices you [students] make now will determine whether India’s rise is transactional or transformational’

title: SC questions Delhi government over ‘hurried’ rollout of new law regulating private school fees
content: Implementing the legislation midway through an ongoing academic session could lead to significant practical and financial difficulties for schools, the Bench says

title: Hoosiers cap perfect season, win 1st national title
content: Indiana completed an undefeated season and won its first national title, beating Miami 27-21 in College Football Playoff final Monday night.

title: Miami's Beck: Game-sealing INT, loss 'really hurts'
content: Quarterback Carson Beck shouldered the blame after a late miscommunication resulted in an interception and the end of Miami's magical season.

title: Sources: Titans finalizing deal to make Saleh coach
content: Robert Saleh is set to become the next coach of the Titans, with sources telling ESPN's Adam Schefter on Monday night that the sides are finalizing a deal.

title: Fins hire Packers DC Hafley as next head coach
content: The Miami Dolphins hired Green Bay Packers defensive coordinator Jeff Hafley as their next head coach, the club announced on Monday night.

title: KU: Self to hospital out of caution, not with team
content: Kansas men's basketball coach Bill Self was hospitalized Monday out of caution and did not travel with the team to Colorado, the school announced.

title: Knicks showered with boos in 'embarrassing' loss
content: The Knicks have gone from NBA Cup champions to not even being able to rule out the play-in tournament thanks to a January freefall that saw them lose for the ninth time in 11 games with their 114-97 defeat to the Mavericks.

title: Toews gets rousing ovation in return to Chicago
content: Jonathan Toews returned to Chicago on Monday night with his hometown Jets, but it was clear that his first NHL city still counts him as one of its own.

title: Way-Too-Early Top 25: Sizing up the top contenders for next season
content: Who will raise the national championship trophy this time next year? We break down the teams to watch.

title: Indiana fans erase forgettable history with unforgettable title
content: Indiana had the most losses, a long Big Ten title drought, no Heismans and no national titles. No more.

title: 'Everyone has someone to cheer for': Inside Fernando Mendoza's Miami homecoming
content: Indiana's quarterback has deep roots in South Florida, creating some split loyalties for the title game.

title: NBA All-Star rosters: Starters, snubs and biggest questions
content: The 2026 NBA All-Star starters are set. Who was the biggest surprise or snub? Which superstar duo are we most excited to see? Experts break it down.

title: NBA midseason grades: Expectations exceeded, short-lived runs and what to watch
content: Kevin Pelton gives a grade for all 30 teams halfway through the season. Which teams exceeded expectations?

title: Men's AP Top 25 poll reaction: Arizona solidifies spot, Kansas returns
content: The latest top-25 poll is out, featuring all three unbeaten teams. What's next for all 25 ranked teams?

title: The Caleb throw, a controversial call and plenty of mistakes: Barnwell sizes up 11 divisional round plays
content: Let's sort out Caleb Williams' wild fourth-quarter TD throw, the Broncos' controversial INT, a big Seattle kickoff return TD, a C.J. Stroud pick-six and more.

title: Let's overreact to divisional round games: Pause Stroud's extension talks? Concern about Stafford?
content: Hold off on any new Stroud deals? Matthew Stafford is in a funk? No Super Bowl yet again for Buffalo? Let's make sense of every divisional round game.

title: Los Angeles prevails in divisional round win over Chicago
content: The Bears had been kings of comeback wins, but the Rams are the ones advancing to the NFC title game.

title: Sizing up the AL Central: What each team still needs to do before spring training
content: There haven't been a lot of headline deals in this division so far, but there's still work left this winter.

title: Man United stun rivals City; Senegal win AFCON amid controversy; Barcelona lose; more
content: What a weekend! Man United stunned their rivals City in a fiery derby, Senegal won AFCON amid controversial scenes, Thomas Frank is on the brink as Spurs boss and Barcelona somehow lost at Real Sociedad.

title: Chaotic AFCON final an embarrassment to soccer
content: Fan clashes, VAR controversies, missed penalties, a walkout, Senegal's extra time winner - the AFCON final had it all.

title: Will Colts, Daniel Jones run it back in 2026?
content: There's mutual interest, but there's also the matter of the QB's recovery from a December torn Achilles.

title: Which injuries will have the biggest impact on the Olympic hockey tournament?
content: Leo Carlsson, Brayden Point and Seth Jones are among those ailing ahead of Milan Cortina. Plus, what to watch in the NHL this week.

title: 'Small details make the difference': How Jannik Sinner has changed his game since the US Open
content: At the 2025 US Open, Sinner was soundly beaten by Alcaraz. Since then, the two-time Australian Open champ has made adjustments.

title: Denver advances, but Bo Nix is out: Six questions about where the Broncos go from here
content: The Broncos advanced to the AFC title game but lost their QB to a broken ankle. So what's next for them on their Super Bowl quest?

title: Transfer rumors, news: Liverpool eye Tottenham's Van de Ven
content: Liverpool and Real Madrid are keeping tabs on Tottenham's Micky van de Ven. Transfer Talk has the latest.

title: Transfer window weekly: Güler to Arsenal? Chelsea squad changes?
content: The winter transfer window is open, so what are our reporters hearing about deals that could be done?

title: Natalia Silva, Max Holloway can create UFC chaos immediately in 2026
content: Natalia Silva, Amanda Nunes, Max Holloway and more fighters who can derail UFC championship predictions in 2026.

title: Elon Musk Polls X On Buying Ryanair After Spat With CEO
content: Elon Musk has once again grabbed global attention by taking a business dispute to social media, this time involving Europe's largest low-cost airline, Ryanair.

title: 'Will Be No. 1 By 2047': Chandrababu Naidu's Sleeping Giant Analogy At Davos
content: Senior Union ministers, along with chief ministers and senior leaders from as many as 10 states, came together here on Monday, irrespective of their political affiliations, to laud India's economic growth and investment prospects.

title: Karachi Mall Fire Death Count Hits 28, Another 80 Missing
content: At least 28 people have died in the fire at a shopping plaza in Pakistan's Karachi, with another 80 missing as rescue operations continued to locate them in the rubble of the old building on Tuesday.

title: Builder Arrested After Noida Techie Drowns In Water-Filled Pit
content: A builder has been arrested in connection with the death of 27-year-old Yuvraj Mehta, who drowned after his SUV fell into a pit dug for construction which was full of water.

title: 'EU Won't Push Back': Trump Mocks NATO Allies With Altered US Map That Includes Greenland
content: US President Donald Trump renewed his push for Greenland, sharing a map of the United States showing the Arctic island, Canada and Venezuela as American territories.

title: Israel Bulldozes UN Headquarters In Jerusalem To Clampdown On Palestinian Aid
content: Israeli crews started bulldozing the Jerusalem headquarters of the U.N. agency for Palestinian refugees, pushing forward with its crackdown against an organisation that delivers humanitarian services to millions of people across the region.

title: Top Court Slams Maneka Gandhi For Stray Dogs Remark, Flags "Body Language"
content: Coming down heavily on animal activist and former Union Minister Maneka Gandhi, the Supreme Court today flagged her "body language" and remarks on the court's observations in the stray dogs case during a podcast.

title: Iran's Exiled Prince Warns Khamenei Of Nazi-Like Nuremberg Trial As Protests Die
content: Reza Pahlavi, Iran's exiled crown prince, has warned Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei of a Nuremberg-like Nazi trial as uneasy calm returned in Tehran after a wave of protests that drew a bloody crackdown.

title: Assam's Kokrajhar Tense After Mob Kills Man Over Cattle Theft Suspicion
content: The police said that the victims were associated with a road construction project and were returning after a site inspection in a vehicle on Monday night.

title: China Invited To Join Trump's 'Board Of Peace', Response Awaited
content: China on Tuesday confirmed that it had been asked to join US President Donald Trump's "Board of Peace," an invitation that Washington had extended to dozens of countries in his bid to launch a global initiative aimed at resolving conflicts.

title: US Man, Carrying Rifle, Enters Russia To Meet Woman, Gets 5 Years In Jail
content: A Russian court sentenced a US citizen to five years in jail for crossing the border with a weapon when he sailed from the United States to meet a Russian woman he met over the Internet, Russia's court service said.

title: Who Is Nickolay Mladenov, Trump's Pick To Head Gaza Board Of Peace
content: Nickolay Mladenov, a former Bulgarian foreign and defense minister, has been appointed director-general of the United States-proposed "Board of Peace" to oversee the transition in Gaza after nearly two-and-a-half years of Israeli bombardment.

title: Punjab Government Launches Statewide Drive Against Gangsters
content: Drawing inspiration from its war against drugs campaign, the Punjab government on Tuesday launched a statewide drive against gangsters aimed at dismantling the entire ecosystem of organised crime.

title: Jaipur Man Creates Rs 25 Lakh Wedding Card Using 3 Kg Silver For Daughter
content: The card, valued at around Rs 25 lakh, features 65 intricately carved deities, with Lord Ganesha at the top, accompanied by the inscription 'Shri Ganeshaya Namah.'

title: Cyber Fraud Targeting Drugmaker Dr Reddy's Busted, Rs 2.16 Crore Recovered
content: Group Pharmaceuticals was due to receive a payment of Rs 2.16 crore from Dr. Reddy's Laboratories. However, hackers gained access to their emails and diverted funds.

title: Russian Killer In Goa Had Photos Of Over 100 Women On His Phone: Sources
content: Sources said that the Russian man, Aleksei Leonov, was "overly obsessed" and could get triggered easily.

title: Politics Not Luxury And Comfort, But Austerity: Newly Elected BJP Chief
content: After being elected the new BJP National President on Tuesday, Nitin Nabin said that this day is "a moment of resolve" for him, as he is not just assuming a post but also the "ideology, traditions, and the responsibility of a nationalist movement of

title: Trucker Escaped Death Where Techie Died, Says Noida Admin Asked Him To Pay
content: Amid allegations of apathy and negligence against the Noida administration in the aftermath of a 27-year-old techie's death due to drowning, NDTV has spoken to a truck driver who miraculously survived an accident at the same spot about two weeks back

title: Shanghai Witnesses Rare Snowfall In 8 Years
content: A wave of low temperature sweeping southern China brought rare snowfall to Shanghai on Tuesday, delighting residents of the financial hub as authorities warned that the frigid weather could last for at least three days.

title: AL West update: Will M's spend more? Will Astros make a deal?
content: the biggest contract handed out in the American League West occurred on Nov. 17, a mere two weeks into the offseason . it wasn't from the Houston Astros, who claimed seven division titles and two world Series championships from 2017 to 2024 . the Seattle Mariners authored one of their greatest seasons in 2025 .

title: NHL trade grades: Who comes out ahead on the Kiefer Sherwood swap?
content: the Calgary Flames traded defenseman Rasmus Andersson to the Vegas Golden Knights for a package that included defenseman Zach Whitecloud . Previously, the Vancouver Canucks traded Quinn Hughes to the Minnesota Wild in exchange for Zeev Buium , Marco Rossi , Liam Ohgren and a 2026 first-round pick . the Pittsburgh Penguins sent goaltender Tristan Jarry and forward Sam Poulin to the Edmonton Oilers .

title: The AFC North: 1 coach, 2 (?) starting QBs, many questions
content: new coach will have to cultivate a working relationship with lamar Jackson . owner Steve Bisciotti learned that Mike Tomlin had stepped down as the Pittsburgh Steelers ' head coach . this has become one of the most surprising offseasons in the AFC North because of the uncharacteristic turnover .

title: Patriots hold off Texans in turnover-filled divisional round playoff game
content: the new England Patriots beat texans 28-16 in a divisional round playoff game . the Patriots' defense forced five turnovers, intercepting Texans quarterback C.J. Stroud four times . new England quarterback Drake Maye overcame three turnovers to help the no. 2 seed advance .

title: Why clamor for Man United, Tottenham 'DNA' makes no sense
content: football DNA is a term that seems to be used only when a manager/head coach is struggling and the supporters and former players boil their difficulties down tainted . the term is called football DNA . it is the first term that has been used to describe a football team's culture .

title: Points league rankings: Young and Davis slide, Sabonis returns

title: Indiana -- yes, Indiana! -- is the national champ! How Curt Cignetti and the Hoosiers did it
content: a year ago, it felt hard to believe the losingest program in FBS history would have much staying power . critics ripped their schedule, called them a fluke, debated whether they even deserved to make the college football Playoff . they should leave the real football to the real blue bloods . the man simply does not lose .

title: Women's AP Top 25 poll reaction: What to know about every team
content: the new AP Top 25 women's college basketball poll is out . the top six teams remain the same . just two of the Huskies' 13 remaining regular-season opponents are ranked: Notre Dame and Tennessee .

title: Sources: Warriors' Butler tears ACL, ending season
content: wing Jimmy Butler suffered a season-ending torn right ACL in a 135-112 win over the Miami Heat . he leaped to grab an entry pass in the middle of the paint and collided with Heat guard Davion Mitchell . his right knee appeared to twist on the landing, sending him sprawling to the court in agony .

title: 🤔 Big questions on Bills' coaching change
content: Sean McDermott's tenure as the Buffalo Bills ' head coach ended Monday . the bills had the second-most wins (98-50) of any franchise since 2017 . general manager Brandon Beane has been promoted to president of football operations .

title: Matt LaFleur's candidates to replace Packers DC Jeff Hafley could include Raheem Morris
content: the Packers wanted to re-sign Matt LeFleur . the Packers lost their defensive coordinator on monday . he will be reunited with former Packers vice president of player personnel . "we'll make sure we have a good plan in place," he says .
